JobTitle: Manager - Contract Lifecycle Management - Advisory Legal Business Services
JobFullDesc: Legal Business Services - Manager - Contract Lifecycle Management   Deloitte Discovery's Legal Business Services (LBS) teams provide a comprehensive suite of legal management consulting, information governance, contract lifecycle management, and technology-enabled services to our clients. Our professionals bring domain knowledge, industry experience, and technology capabilities to provide strategic, proactive approaches to support the future of legal departments and related functions.  Deloitte Discovery's U.S. operations is comprised of the following services:  Legal Business Services  Data Remediation  eDiscovery Services  Work you'll do   As a Manager in Legal Business Services supporting our Contract Lifecycle Management practice, you will lead a team of experienced professionals to help clients transform and efficiently manage all aspects of the contract lifecycle, leveraging artificial intelligence, machine learning and other technologies. You will contribute directly to delivering first class consultative services to our clients, and your support of the engagement lifecycle will include engagement leadership, sales and pursuit support, eminence, legal management consulting, legal process assessment, solution design, service delivery, and coaching and mentoring junior practitioners.  Additional responsibilities may include:  Manage delivery of large, complex or multiple smaller simultaneous client engagements  Organize and deliver services on a cross-section of complex projects  Responsible for the development of business and vendor relationships  Manage pursuit teams focused on new opportunities and manage /deliver aspects of the proposal development process  Responsible for project(s) financials including development of financial plans  Manage day-to-day interactions with clients and Deloitte team  Establish relationships in strategic client positions; lead, and facilitate these relationships  Display both breadth and depth of knowledge regarding functional and technical issues  Provide counselling/coaching, leadership and support for delivery teams and staff  Actively participate in staff recruitment and retention activities providing input and guidance into the staffing process Qualifications  Required:  Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Business, Finance or other Business-related field  6+ years of Forensic, Investigative, and/or Discovery industry related experience  2+ years in a technical or functional lead role  Experience mentoring and coaching others  Proven leadership skills demonstrating strong judgment, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities  Experience managing mid-level client relationships  Experience presenting to clients or other decision makers to present and sell ideas to various audiences (technical and non-technical)  Pre-sales, proposal, and RFP experience  Proven track record of consistently attaining managed revenue targets as well as achieving quarterly or yearly sales objectives for new business  Must be able to obtain and maintain required clearance for this role  Experience in 1 or more of the following technologies:  Contract Lifecycle Management and Extraction: Kira Systems, Seal Software, Eigen, Exari, Icertis, Apttus, Oracle, SAP Ariba,  Proficiency with MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Excel, MS Project, Visio  Limited immigration sponsorship may be available.  Travel up to 50% (While the ability to travel up to 50% is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice)  Preferred:  JD or MBA
